descriptionHtml:
New version notes at bottom, take particular note about the flames mk 2 ability (instructions included on how to make it stop when you want to) and removing/re-adding kbar + gear.

===

Type Help KBAR in console, then type player.addperk ######## where ######## is the id for kbar. Or just add the perk from the alteration perk tree when you gain the ability to do so.

Slightly faster sprinting
Much faster sneaking
100% pickpocket rate
No falling damage
No incoming damage from attacks (except traps)
Your attacks (not spells) deal 10000x more damage
Telekinesis thrown objects deal +100000 damage
No stagger
Much faster attack animation with a bow
Enchantments 1000x more powerful
Waterwalking when wearing glass boots (glass boots have been renamed zglassboots for certain reasons)
Craftable items in cookpot (a bow, arrows, some clothes, 2 daggers)
One dagger has the ability to attack at range at a high rate of speed.
The other dagger does no damage and has no range but has high speed, so if you make an attack with it while sprinting it will propel you forwards. (you need the sprint attack one handed perk to do this)
Special Arrows from cookpot fly straight*
Other effects you can see in your active effects category
Instant gold restock of merchants

*Add these to your skyrim.ini file (usually in documents->my games)
[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PBoltTiltUpAngle=0.7
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.0
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.0

Other Recommended Mods for more fun:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60756/?]Instant Mining[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52213/?]Infinite Gold for Merchants[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35362/?]No Killcams[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20345/?]FTFI (Fast Travel From Indoors)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26638/?]Levitate[/url]

Notes:
+When doing the dragonstone/golden claw quest, walk towards your objective after opening the claw door to ensure that the enemy pops out of his coffin.
+When facing miraak, kill all 3 dragons first and then you can 1 shot him without worrying about the bug of him not being attackable

===

New version:
+More firepower (basically some new fire based lesser powers)
+Lesser Power Cooldown timer = 0 (Now you don't have to wait at all for lesser powers) [Thank you [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1699423-a-way-to-reduce-cooldown-for-lesser-powers/?p=14882283]xairgeo[/url] from the forums]
+Bribing now costs nothing (because your speechcraft is 1 Million)
+Maybe other stuff? Not sure.

NOTE: If you install this new mod after using the old one, make sure to remove and re add KBAR perk (because your abilities, powers, lesser powers will disappear and need re-adding). Also, your zItems will be gone (except your glass boots), so make sure to make new ones at a cookpot.
NOTE2: When using the flames mk2 lesser power, it will keep going until you draw a weapon (or your fists) or use another lesser power. You cannot jump while it is going, but you can attack. You cannot use shouts after stopping it through an ability until you use that ability a second time. You can use shouts if you stopped it by drawing a weapon (or your fists). Overall, it is interesting, but quirky.

===

Added a plasma beam standalone that grants a long range beam attack (meridia temple beam that does 8 million shock damage but ignores resistance etc) and a short range frostbite (8 million, ignores resistance etc).

Type Help Plasma to find the code to add it through the console. You can either add the two spells individually or the perk which gives both.
author: User_4079923
